attributes.action: STOP social services taking children for all the wrong reasons
attributes.background: since 2012 i have noticed social services are removeing children for all the wrong reasons and lieing just to take children off there loving parents and some thing needs doing about this !! Social services should be supporting parents not making there's and there children's life a living hell

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

Social services are the responsibility of local councils. If you want to make a specific complaint about social services, or get more advice about what action you could take, this web site may help you: 

https://www.citizensadvice.org.uk/relationships/looking-after-people/children-and-local-authority-care/
